attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an added expense for groups that are already financially stretched to their limits.  Give charities a break.  The PM knows how valuable the work of charities are and the pressure they relieve on welfare state services.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop making charities pay VAT."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12791.asp

Prime Minister's Office
